Segment.name: SS
Segment.comment: To specify information about rate level and rate docket independence

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: RateLevel
Field.comment: Identifies the broad tariff change which is reflected in the rate amounts and need not be separately applied; when a rail carrier's cost recovery (RCCR) change is not applicable, then "N/A" will appear in this element

Field.name: RateDistributionCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the extent to which data intermediaries may distribute rate data (excluding revenue division information) to requesting recipients

Field.name: IndependenceCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the capability of a carrier participating in the route of a rate to make independent changes to that rate

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date3
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date4
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

SyntaxNote.name: P0102
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SS01 or SS02 is present, then the other is required.
